data.name: Warface - Open Cup Rifleman Set
data.detailed_description:
Open Cup Rifleman Set


The Open Cup set equipment includes gear for the Rifleman and an assault rifle MSBS Radon. The items are allowed in the game's official eSports tournaments, as well as in Ranked Matches. They are well suited for PvP battles.



The uniforms have an impressive defense against headshots, as well as explosions and flash grenades. They also increase the reload speed and the weapon change speed.



The helmet will help you restore health quicker, the vest will reduce damage by 10 points per hit, gloves will increase accuracy, and tournament boots will help you use the sprint more effectively and avoid claymores.

By equipping all 4 items from the set, your armor will increase by 15 additional points.



The polish modular weapon MSBS Radon has good damage, high rate of fire that makes it possible to use this rifle in any situation, be it storming an object or a quiet operation. There are three slots available for mounting the entire range of attachments for the Rifleman, so you can easily customize this weapon for any type of gameplay style.

The MSBS Radon uses a box-type 30-round magazine. The rifle has a weak, easily controllable recoil, and also sports excellent damage and rate of fire values. Nevertheless, the gun is not optimal at long ranges.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
